Row.Text: The Hashemite Raider is adept at hit-and-run tactics and disrupting enemy supply lines. Whenever it pillages an improvement, adjacent enemy units take 10 damage.

The Hashemite Raider is the Arabian replacement for the Light Tank. It is stronger than the unit it replaces, available earlier, and does not require Aluminum. It requires no movement to pillage, and deals damage to adjacent enemy units when pillaging improvements.
No movement cost to pillage. When pillaging an improvement, adjacent enemy units take 10 damage.
+25% combat strength and double movement in Deserts.
